item.title: #en @ 1501833831388786688
item.description:
How do data gaps arise ‚ùì
Data gaps don't just result from data not being collected. Weak methodologies & data which is poorly processed & analysed also contribute to widening data gaps, including the #GenderData gap.
Source: https://t.co/5qcCrjc0eO https://t.co/MacXlNGEEn

item.title: #en @ 1501620901082767367
item.description:
Misconceptions about preregistration üßµ:
1. Preregistration says nothing about the quality of decision-making. It just makes the timing and extent of analyses transparent. Likewise, open data/materials says nothing about the quality of the data/materials, just the availability.

item.title: #en @ 1501585970822537218
item.description:
@russpoldrack Once, I tried to reproduce stimuli for a Psych Science paper with open data + open materials badges, but the code was missing. I asked the editor who said that code for generating stimuli and analysis is not needed for an open materials badge.
Since then, I've been anti-badge.

item.title: #en @ 1501583582661431304
item.description: I'm looking forward to my lecture tomorrow. It's about NYC crime data, yes, and we will go through a bunch of that stuff (like the whole "solving crimes" thing) but it'll also explore what does open data mean for abolitionists and should we really be demanding more policing data.

item.title: #en @ 1501582971102445578
item.description: There's no unused beige land in the UK we can build railways on: re-opening old lines & building new ones means a change in land use. There are >52,000 ancient woodlands in England and they're scattered around like confetti. See this interactive map. /5 https://t.co/waNa6rLyyI

item.title: #en @ 1501576823871881223
item.description:
Dear @Europarl_EN Members: Please, urge the @EU_Commission to immediately implement the Open Data Directive, ensuring that the rules requiring full transparency of company ownership are in place ASAP.
This is crucial in exposing assets & money of Russian oligarchs in the EU.
